name: Hole that steals things
description:
Hey everyone,This is my first time participating in Game Jam.I have learned a lot in the past week, And I will participate in more Game Jam in the future.

GamePlay

The player will play an unknown hole-like creature that is attracted by some kind of energy block so the purpose of the game is to get the energy block.

Use WASD to move. SPACE to absorb energy block.

Follow-up plan

There are still many ideas for this demo that have not been realized,So although there is only one demo with a low degree of completion, I will continue to improve it in order to eventually become a playable game.
